item.name: Search for from google books api

request.description:
### Overview

This API endpoint allows you to search for books by title, author, or other keywords. It queries the Google Books API to fetch relevant book information based on your search criteria.

### HTTP Request

`GET http://localhost:3333/api/v1/books`

### Query Parameters

| Parameter | Description | Required | Type | Example |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `q` | Query text to search for books. This can include titles, authors, or keywords. | Yes | string | `python` |
| `page` | The page number of the search results you wish to retrieve. Each page contains a fixed number of results. | No | integer | `2` |

response.name: Search for from google books api

request.description:
### Overview

This API endpoint allows authenticated users to retrieve a list of their bookmarks. The bookmarks are paginated to facilitate easier navigation and management.

### HTTP Request

`GET http://localhost:3333/api/v1/bookmarks/my-bookmarks`

### Query Parameters

| Parameter | Description | Required | Type | Default |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `page` | Specifies the page number of the bookmark list to retrieve. | No | integer | `1` |
| `limit` | Specifies the number of bookmarks per page. | No | integer | `10` |

### Overview

This API endpoint allows authenticated users to add a bookmark for a specific book. The operation checks if the user is logged in and if the book has not been bookmarked by the user previously.

### HTTP Request

`POST http://localhost:3333/api/v1/bookmarks/{bookId}`

### URL Parameter

| Parameter | Description | Required | Type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `bookId` | The unique identifier for the book to be bookmarked. | Yes | string |

response.name: Bookmark already exists
response.body: Bookmark already exists for this user

response.name: Unauthorized
response.body: Unauthorized. You must be logged in to perform this operation
